title: Inflation Impacts Back-to-School Spending
itunes:title: Inflation Impacts Back-to-School Spending
description:
Mary Lou Gardner, Associate Partner for CPG Retail and Logistics at Infosys Consulting, discusses this year’s back-to-school shopping season and why consumers are expected to spend more but get less due to price inflation.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
